column2: Oh you're new. I farm here with my sister. You should talk to her.
...Control yourself, Emilio. Do NOT give this to me again.
Oh... uh... thanks. I'm glad you got me this.
Hey, thanks for this. I mean it, people don't give me gifts often and this is really nice.
Another day toiling in the fields. It'd be nice if Vintius helped out for once.
column3: Just gotta get through this week.
column4: You should talk to my sister. She enjoys talking to people.$I don't.
